org.alljoyn.ns

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alljoyn.ns.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    The Notification that is sent over the network

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dismiss()
      When the notification message is dismissed, it is first of all deleted by the Notification Producer and then a dismiss signal is sent to update other Notification Consumers that the Notification has been dismissed

      • getOriginalSenderBusName

        public java.lang.String getOriginalSenderBusName()
        The sender Id of the Bus that originally sent the Notification message. If the Notification was received from a Super Agent, the sender field of the object is of the Super Agent, and this field is the value of the Notification producer that has originally sent the message.
        Returns:
        Bus name of the original Notification sender
